wikipedia_page.main: Percy John Ebdon (16 March 1874 – 16 February 1943) was an English sportsman who made two international rugby union appearances for England, and made two first-class cricket appearances for Somerset in 1894.As a rugby player, Ebdon was a second row forward. England lost both the international matches he played in during the 1896-97 season, once to Wales and once to Ireland.
